isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CAB COWL TRAY

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Cowl Tray on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

step1.para: Unlatch hood on both sides and tilt hood to fully open position.

Remove both driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
. For removing driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly, refer to Remove Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 90 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove washer hose (Item 1, view arrow A) from under cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow A) on driver side.
Slide rubber seal (Item 3, view arrow E) off antenna (Item 4, view arrow E) on passenger side.

Remove hex flanged bolt (Item 5, view arrow C) from angle bracket (Item 6, view arrow C) going into cowl tray mounting bracket (Item 7, view arrow C) under the cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow C) on passenger side.

figure.caption: Figure 90. Cab Cowl Tray on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

step1.para: Remove torx pan head screw (Item 8) securing angle bracket (Item 6) to the AC evaporator box (Item 9) at the front of cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow C) on passenger side.
Remove hex flanged bolt (Item 10, section A - A) from center mounting bracket (Item 11, section A - A) at the center of cowl tray (Item 2, section A - A).
Remove hex flanged nut (Item 12, view arrow B) at the driver side of cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow B).
Remove hex flanged nut (Item 13, view arrow D) at the passenger side of cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow D).

Once all mounting hardware securing cowl tray (Item 2) have been removed, slide the holes in the cowl tray forward off the mounting studs (Item 14) and over both driver and passenger side wiper pivot posts (Item 15).
Lift cowl tray (Item 2) up over the antenna (Item 4) and lay it out of the way and save for installation.
